name: unfiltered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having had solids removed with a filter: unfiltered apple juice
with no information removed: The radio station provides millions of people with unfiltered news and political debate.
used for referring to cigarettes or cigars without filters in one end to remove harmful substances
